title: Today Is The Day, Go Vote 11.3.20
itunes:title: Today Is The Day, Go Vote 11.3.20
description:
In episode 749, Jack and Miles are joined by super producers Anna Hossnieh and Danl Goodman to discuss Trump threatening legal action to stop vote counting, self massaging technologies, election technology, self-care, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. President Trump Threatens Legal Action To Stop Counting Of Pennsylvania Ballots Arriving After Election Day
  2. Three Words That Haunt Joe Biden: ‘Dewey Defeats Truman’
  3. “White House on lockdown”: Trump to host election night party House behind “non-scalable” fence
  4. Networks Pledge Caution for an Election Night Like No Other
  5. The Trouble with Election Projections
  6. Elections in Colonial America Were Huge, Booze-Fueled Parties
  7. The History of Election Night
  8. The Night A Computer Predicted The Next President
  9. This Is America (El. Train Edit)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
